analysis.description:
FornicoinCrowdsale.forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#422-423) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#422-423)

FornicoinCrowdsale.haltSale (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#351) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- buyTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#390-417)

FornicoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#390-417) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#414-415)

FornicoinCrowdsale.withdrawTeamTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#448-455) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,teamTokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#452-453)

FornicoinCrowdsale.distPresale (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#455-462) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_presale,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#458-462)

FornicoinCrowdsale.finalizeSale (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,difference) (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol)

Reentrancy in FornicoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#390-417):
	External calls:
	- token.updateTotalSupply(tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#410-411)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#414)

FornicoinCrowdsale.haltSale should be constant (/unique_chucks/20/0x658d9424da329087a60868957f9b1d1edd1d6f34.sol#351)
